<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PointerMayBeCaptured - Return true if this pointer value may be captured</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// by the enclosing function (which is required to exist).  This routine can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be expensive, so consider caching the results.  The boolean ReturnCaptures</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// specifies whether returning the value (or part of it) from the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// counts as capturing it or not.  The boolean StoreCaptures specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// whether storing the value (or part of it) into memory anywhere</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// automatically counts as capturing it or not.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MaxUsesToExplore specifies how many uses the analysis should explore for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// one value before giving up due too &quot;too many uses&quot;. If MaxUsesToExplore</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is zero, a default value is assumed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7912b6c9e7843ca9fd5a11e199bef617">PointerMayBeCaptured</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ReturnCaptures,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StoreCaptures, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxUsesToExplore = 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PointerMayBeCapturedBefore - Return true if this pointer value may be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// captured by the enclosing function (which is required to exist). If a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DominatorTree is provided, only captures which happen before the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction are considered. This routine can be expensive, so consider</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// caching the results.  The boolean ReturnCaptures specifies whether</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// returning the value (or part of it) from the function counts as capturing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it or not.  The boolean StoreCaptures specified whether storing the value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (or part of it) into memory anywhere automatically counts as capturing it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or not. Captures by the provided instruction are considered if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// final parameter is true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MaxUsesToExplore specifies how many uses the analysis should explore for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// one value before giving up due too &quot;too many uses&quot;. If MaxUsesToExplore</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is zero, a default value is assumed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3693cec8e936224ad3e5748debe73b75">PointerMayBeCapturedBefore</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ReturnCaptures,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IncludeI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxUsesToExplore = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns the &#39;earliest&#39; instruction that captures \\p V in \\F. An instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A is considered earlier than instruction B, if A dominates B. If 2 escapes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// do not dominate each other, the terminator of the common dominator is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chosen. If not all uses can be analyzed, the earliest escape is set to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the first instruction in the function entry block. If \\p V does not escape,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nullptr is returned. Note that the caller of the function has to ensure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the instruction the result value is compared against is not in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa4e19c0182383b430a2e2b94808e0a89">FindEarliestCapture</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Determine what kind of capture behaviour \\p U may exhibit.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A use can be no-capture, a use can potentially capture, or a use can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// passthrough such that the uses of the user or \\p U should be inspected.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The \\p IsDereferenceableOrNull callback is used to rule out capturing for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// certain comparisons.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae85d31e76aca6a11a1d0fd6ae9306a12">UseCaptureKind</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PointerMayBeCaptured - Visit the value and the values derived from it and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// find values which appear to be capturing the pointer value. This feeds</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// results into and is controlled by the CaptureTracker object.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MaxUsesToExplore specifies how many uses the analysis should explore for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// one value before giving up due too &quot;too many uses&quot;. If MaxUsesToExplore</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is zero, a default value is assumed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7912b6c9e7843ca9fd5a11e199bef617">PointerMayBeCaptured</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Value &#42;V, CaptureTracker &#42;Tracker,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
